Detailed Description

A State Variable Filter object.

One of the features of a state variable filter is that it can provide all 4 filter types simultaneously from the same algorithm.

This implementation takes a different approach which requires the selection of one of the types. At some point in the future we could add a mode to get all 4 signals out of the output...
